WHAT_TO_EXPECT.WHAT_TO_EXPECT_FROM: What to Expect from your Eye Exam
WHAT_TO_EXPECT.GET_READY_FOR: Get Ready for your Eye Exam!
WHAT_TO_EXPECT.DURING_YOUR_APPOINTMENT: During your appointment, you will receive a complete eye exam that goes beyond keeping your prescription up to date. It also includes evaluating your overall vision health to help detect early signs of serious eye conditions.
WHAT_TO_EXPECT.INSURANCE_CARD: Insurance card (if you have one). Learn more about our
WHAT_TO_EXPECT.IF_YOU_HAVE: If you have not been vaccinated, we ask that you wear a mask in-store for the safety of others
WHAT_TO_EXPECT.EYE_EXAMS_ARE: Eye exams are provided by Physicians Eyecare Group, a national network of affiliated independent eye doctors and clinical staff that provide on-site and remote clinical services within Stanton Optical. Physicians Eyecare Group will oversee every aspect of your eye examination and eye health check up, which goes well beyond your prescription.
WHAT_TO_EXPECT.DIAGONISTIC_TESTING: Diagnostic Testing – Our trained technician will administer a series of clinical measurements to provide the doctor a more comprehensive assessment of your eye, allowing screening for serious eye conditions such as glaucoma, macular degeneration, and diabetic retinopathy. With these test results, the doctor will evaluate your entire visual system from the corneal surface at the front to the retinal tissue and optic nerve tissue in the back of your eye.
WHAT_TO_EXPECT.ACUITIES_AND_REFRACTION_EXAM: Acuities and Refraction exam – Reading vision assessment is performed in all patients that are symptomatic by looking at accommodation and near point reading requirements, and near point, reading add requirements. You may be offered a state-of-the-art telehealth exam to assess your prescription.
WHAT_TO_EXPECT.SLIT_LAMP_EVALUATION: Slit Lamp evaluation – Performed as needed, this assessment will evaluate the health of the front of the eye, where cataracts develop.
WHAT_TO_EXPECT.AND_YOU_WILL: to manage your appointment, and see your digital prescription after you have gone through your eye exam. You can also fill out your
WHAT_TO_EXPECT.TO_SAVE_YOU: to save you time when visiting the store.

ABOUT_US.SINCE_OPENING: Since opening its first store in Mishawaka, Indiana in 2007, Stanton Optical has provided exceptional customer service and thousands of stylish frames at competitive and affordable prices. Our affiliated doctor network in-store also provides complete eye exams including a vision health check for a full-service experience. Stanton Optical’s knowledgeable team walks you through the process every step of the way to ensure you leave with the right frames at the best price possible. You can even get your glasses the same day based on your prescription.
ABOUT_US.WE_UNDERSTAND: We understand getting new glasses can be a long, stressful process. That’s why we provide you with a personalized, guided experience to make it quick and easy. Our optical lab utilizes the latest technology and computer automated machinery, and skilled lab technicians cut, polish, and grind lenses to customize every pair. Once the lenses are assembled and mounted into the frames, the glasses get a quality assurance check before being delivered to the store and ready for customer pick-up. Plus, we design our own frames and work directly with eyewear manufacturers, so we can pass significant savings on to you.
ABOUT_US.AS_ALWAYS: As always, customer satisfaction is our priority. Our team of optical professionals are dedicated to helping you find your perfect fit. For added convenience, we are continually expanding our locations, so check back regularly for a new store near you.
ABOUT_US.WE_BELIEVE: We believe in modernizing the eye care experience for all people.
ABOUT_US.WE_SEE_INTEGRITY: We see integrity as building a foundation of trust with our customers, employees and stakeholders by communicating honestly, ensuring consistency and delivering on our commitments.
ABOUT_US.WE_SEE_COLLABORATION: We see collaboration as combining the talents of a diverse group, offering proactive communication and being open-minded to new ideas.
ABOUT_US.WE_SEE_ACCOUNTABILITY: We see accountability as taking initiative, delivering our best in all we do, accepting responsibility for our actions and taking ownership of results.
ABOUT_US.WE_SEE_RESPECT: We see respect as prioritizing human relationships, being present, connecting with transparency and empathy.
ABOUT_US.WE_SEE_EMPOWERMENT: We see empowerment as making purpose-driven decisions to support the company vision, showing appreciation for others, and taking care of the individuals we serve.

EYE_EXAM_LP.YOUR_EYE_EXAM: Your Eye Exam: Fast, Easy & Affordable
EYE_EXAM_LP.MANY_PEOPLE: Many people don’t realize the importance of eye care. However, many ophthalmologists and optometrists advise to get an eye exam at least once a year. With the fast-paced environment we live in today and the fact that we use screens everywhere, it’s no wonder why.
EYE_EXAM_LP.EYE_EXAMS: Eye exams are one of the most overlooked health procedures. However, frequent vision tests are one of the best ways to prevent serious diseases and detect any changes in your vision quality before these affect your health, safety, and wellbeing. In fact, ophthalmologists and optometrists recommend annual eye exams.
EYE_EXAM_LP.AT_STANTON_OPTICAL: At Stanton Optical, our mission is to make eye care easy, and that includes your eye exam experience provided by our independent eye doctors.
EYE_EXAM_LP.YOU_CAN_BOOK_YOUR_APPOINTMENT: : You can book your appointment online, via phone
EYE_EXAM_LP.OR_IN_STORE: , or in-store. Modify your appointment by
EYE_EXAM_LP.CREATING_YOUR_ACCOUNT_TAKE: . Creating your account takes just 2 minutes. You will have access to all your information including your contact details, appointment, order history and prescription.
EYE_EXAM_LP.IF_YOU_NEED: : If you need an exam now, simply walk-in and get your exam. No prior appointment is necessary. It’s that easy.
EYE_EXAM_LP.YOUR_EYE_EXAM_IS: : Your eye exam is completely free when you purchase 2 pairs of glasses. If you only need an eye exam, it’s only $59* ($89 in AK) without insurance or $99* ($109 OK, AR and AK) for contacts, which also includes a prescription for glasses.
EYE_EXAM_LP.WE_ACCEPT_MOST: We accept most vision insurance, FSA, HSA, and CareCredit including Buy Now, Pay Later interest-free options in-store.
EYE_EXAM_LP.HERE_WHAT_YOU: Here’s what you’ll get for your eye exam
EYE_EXAM_LP.A_COMPLETE_EYE_EXAM: A complete eye exam from Stanton Optical includes a thorough evaluation of your vision health, including a retinal scan. Something most optical retailers charge more for. Moreover, the exam will help to detect any early signs of serious eye conditions.
EYE_EXAM_LP.WE_OFFER_EYE_EXAM: We offer eye exams for both
EYE_EXAM_LP.PLUS: . Plus, your contact lens exam also includes a prescription for glasses.
EYE_EXAM_LP.YOU_CAN_EASILY: , you can easily fill out your
EYE_EXAM_LP.IN_THE_CONVENIENCE: in the convenience of your home, before your exam, to speed up your office visit. Creating your account takes 2 minutes and submitting your information just 10 minutes.
EYE_EXAM_LP.TO_CREATE_YOUR_ACCOUNT: to create your account or Log-in. If you’re not able to submit your information prior to your visit, please expect longer wait times.
EYE_EXAM_LP.THE_DOCTOR: The doctor’s technician will administer five pre-tests to provide a more comprehensive assessment of your eye health. This screening can detect early signs of serious eye conditions such as glaucoma and cataracts.
EYE_EXAM_LP.THE_FOLLOWING_TESTS: The following tests are included in your eye exam:
EYE_EXAM_LP.OUR_TECHNICIAN: Our technician will then escort you to a private, sanitized exam room for an Acuities and Refraction Exam to test for your prescription. Our exclusive telehealth technology allows us to perform this eye exam virtually via video-screen. A physical doctor is also available on-site.

PRIVACY_POLICY.THIS_PRIVACY_POLICY: This Privacy Policy (“Policy”) is effective as of May 26, 2021.
PRIVACY_POLICY.THIS_POLICY_POLICY_DESCRIBES: This Policy describes how Now Optics and all direct and indirect subsidiaries and affiliates (collectively “Company,” “we,” “our,” or “us”), collect, use, and disclose personal information through our websites located at
PRIVACY_POLICY.AND_ANY_OTHER: , and any other websites that link to this Policy (collectively “Sites”) and certain other services as described below. Other Company websites, products, and services may have their own privacy policies.
PRIVACY_POLICY.PERSONAL_INFORMATION_IS: “Personal information”, is any information that enables us to identify you, directly or indirectly, by reference to an identifier such as your name, identification number, location data, online identifier or one or more other factors specific to you.
PRIVACY_POLICY.IMPORTANT_NOTICE: IMPORTANT NOTICE: YOUR USE, DOWNLOAD, AND/OR RECEIVING OF ANY OF THE SITES IS SUBJECT TO AN ARBITRATION PROVISION IN THE SECTION TITLED “GOVERNING LAW; ARBITRATION; CLASS-ACTION WAIVER” BELOW, REQUIRING ALL CLAIMS TO BE RESOLVED BY WAY OF BINDING ARBITRATION, UNLESS PROHIBITED BY LAW.
PRIVACY_POLICY.BY_USING_THE_SITES: By using the SITES, you acknowledge and agree that your personal information will be used as set forth in this Policy.
PRIVACY_POLICY.IF_YOU_DO_NOT_AGREE: If you do not agree to the terms of this Policy, please do not use the Sites.
PRIVACY_POLICY.WHEN_USING_OUR_SITES: When using our Sites or our services, you may provide us with your personal information through a variety of methods, including the following: (1) via signups on our Sites, such as through the creation of an account; (2) from an online, email, retail, fax, or telephone purchase; (3) when you enter a sweepstakes, giveaway, contest, or other promotion, or complete a survey; (4) when you provide information at our stores; (5) upon contacting us, such as through customer service communications, including our online chat features; (6) upon signing up at an event; (7) upon registering a Company product; (8) when you submit a business reply, product, or warranty card; (9) when you post material to the Sites, such as through product reviews; or (10) when you interact with us for any other purpose. Information that you provide through the Sites can be combined with the information that we collect from you in any other way.
PRIVACY_POLICY.WE_MAY_ALSO_COLLECT: We may also collect certain personal information automatically when you use the Sites, as described below.
PRIVACY_POLICY.WE_MAY_RECEIVE_PERSONAL: We may receive personal information about you from third parties and combine it with information you have provided to us.
PRIVACY_POLICY.WHEN_YOU_INTERACT_WITH: When you interact with us, we may collect personal information that you choose to provide, such as your name, address, email address, phone number, payment information, demographic information (such as your income level and gender), date of birth, information regarding your membership with other organizations (e.g., to provide discounts), prescription information, medical history and information about your vision health, photos, scans and recordings, and any other information you choose to provide. If you contact our customer service department, you may need to provide us with additional personal information so that we can respond to your questions or concerns as completely and thoroughly as possible. If you create an account with us, we collect your username and password. If you are providing delivery information or other personal information which is not your own, then you must have that person’s permission to give us their personal information and for us to use and share it for the purposes specified.
PRIVACY_POLICY.WHEN_YOU_MAKE_PURCHASE: When you make a purchase, we will collect your payment card, gift card, or other payment information. Company takes reasonable steps to protect the security of payment card information such as by using tokenization, a storage technique which replaces payment card data with randomized identifiers.
PRIVACY_POLICY.IF_YOU_APPLY: If you apply for a job through one of our Sites, we will collect any personal information you provide in your application, including, but not limited to, educational background, employment history, and references.
PRIVACY_POLICY.SOME_OF_THE_AFFILIATES: Some of the affiliates and brands covered by this Policy are subject to the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act of 1996 (“HIPAA”). These affiliates and brands may collect additional information that is considered “protected health information” (“PHI”) as defined by HIPAA. When the information that we collect is considered PHI, we will handle that PHI in accordance with our
PRIVACY_POLICY.PLEASE_VISIT_THAT: . Please visit that notice for information on our privacy practices, our legal duties, and your rights concerning your PHI.
PRIVACY_POLICY.WE_THIRD_PARTIES: We (or third parties operating on the Sites) also may automatically collect technical information when you use our Sites (for example, browser version, IP address, Internet service provider, referring/exit pages, geo-location, operating system, date/time stamp, clickstream data and reference site domain name, customer traffic patterns, website usage, and other analytics information such as key stroke logs). PRIVACY_POLICY.TO_PROCESS_TRACK: To process, track and fulfill your order, including communication about your order status and shipment, or any other related information.
PRIVACY_POLICY.TO_CONFIRM_SCHEDULE: To confirm, schedule or provide other services related to your eye exam appointment
PRIVACY_POLICY.TO_ADMINISTER_A_CONTEST: To administer a contest, promotion, survey, or other site feature, and to provide you with the relevant products or services (for instance to deliver a prize you may have won in a contest).

PRIVACY_POLICY.WE_DO_NOT_SELL: We do not sell your personal information but may share the personal information that we collect with third parties as lawfully permitted, including as discussed below.
PRIVACY_POLICY.PERSONAL_INFORMATION_COLLECTED: Personal information collected through our Sites may be shared between the brands and affiliates of the Company.

PRIVACY_POLICY.WE_MAY_ALSO_SHARE_YOUR: We may also share your personal information with your consent or as otherwise disclosed at the time of data collection or sharing.

EYE_EXAM.META_DESCRIPTION: At {brand}, you get a Free Eye Exam for your new Eyeglasses or Contact Lenses. Book your Free Eye Exam online now!
EYE_EXAM.PRIORITIZING_YOUR_EYE: Prioritizing your eye health has never been more critical due to the eye strain and exposure to lights caused by our continuous use of digital devices in our everyday lives. This is why we strive to lead the industry with innovation, making the process of getting your annual eye exam easier and more convenient than ever.
EYE_EXAM.AT_STANTON_OPTICAL: At {brand}, our mission is to make eye care easy, including your eye exam experience. Eye exams are provided by independent eye doctors at
EYE_EXAM.A_GROUP_OF: a group of optometrists and ophthalmologists committed to patient-first quality eye care.
EYE_EXAM.EYE_EXAMS: Eye exams are crucial for maintaining good vision and overall eye health. The benefits of a regularly scheduled eye exam include:
EYE_EXAM.EYE_EXAMS_CAN_DETECT: Eye exams can detect early signs of glaucoma, macular degeneration, and cataracts.
EYE_EXAM.EYE_EXAM_CAN_REVEL: Eye exams can reveal symptoms of broader health issues such as
EYE_EXAM.LET_BE_HONEST: Let’s be honest, picking out a new set of frames is exciting! Check out our selection of over 1,500 frames in-store or online.
EYE_EXAM.HOW_MUCH_DOES: How much does an eye exam cost?
EYE_EXAM.YOUR_COMPREHENSIVE_EYE_EXAM: Your comprehensive eye exam is completely free when you purchase 2 pairs of glasses. Otherwise, the eye exam is only $79* ($109 in AK, ND) without insurance or $119* ($129 in OK, AR, AK, ND and SD) for contacts, which also includes a prescription for glasses.
EYE_EXAM.WE_ACCEPT_MOST: We accept most vision insurance, FSA, HSA, and CareCredit, including Buy Now Pay Later interest-free options in-store.
EYE_EXAM.YOUR_COMPREHENSIVE_EYE_EXAM_AT: Your comprehensive eye exam at {brand} includes a
EYE_EXAM.THOROUGH_EVALUATION: thorough evaluation of your eye health, including retinal imaging.
EYE_EXAM.BUT_THAT_JUST: But that’s just the tip of the iceberg. Once you have provided us with your Medical History (create an account and get it done ahead of your visit!), our hi-tech equipment allows us to find out a lot about your eye health quickly.
EYE_EXAM.THIS_QUICK_PROCESS: This quick process is performed by a doctor’s technician on location, and includes:
EYE_EXAM.MEASURE_THE_PRESSURE: Measures the pressure inside your eye; important for glaucoma detection.
EYE_EXAM.HELPS_PROVIDE_A_STARTING: Helps provide a starting point for your prescription and measures the curvature of the front of the eye.
EYE_EXAM.WE_TAKE_PICTURES_INSIDE: Pictures are taken of the inside of your eye, which allows the doctor to view the back of your eye, without dilation, to assess the health of your optic nerve, retina, and blood vessels, critical in detecting serious eye and health conditions like glaucoma and macular degeneration.
EYE_EXAM.WE_TAKE_PICTURES_FRONT: Pictures are taken of the front of your eye which, allows the doctor to view the anterior structures of your eye, like the scleral, cornea, and lens, and detect conditions like cataracts.
EYE_EXAM.THE_DOCTOR_TECHNICIAN: The doctor’s technician will then show you to a sanitized, private exam room. Our patented telehealth technology allows independent doctors to perform this portion of the eye exam virtually with the help of an online technician. The doctor is available for any questions—allowing us to provide a comfortable and tailored experience just for you.
EYE_EXAM.AN_OPHTHALMOLOGIST: An Ophthalmologist (MD or DO) or Optometrist (OD) will review your results and create a customized eye care treatment plan and prescription.
EYE_EXAM.CHILDREN_AS_YOUNG: Children as young as 6-8 years old can get their eye exam at {brand}. Kids’ eye exams should be regularly scheduled as vision complications can affect learning and overall development. Early detection is vital for timely intervention.
EYE_EXAM.WHAT_TO_BRING: What to Bring with You for Your Eye Exam
EYE_EXAM.WE_LOOK_FORWARD: We look forward to your visit!
EYE_EXAM.ONLY_AVAILABLE: Only available at a specific day and time?
EYE_EXAM.HAVE_VERY_LITTLE: Have very little time between errands?
EYE_EXAM.CHOOSE_THE_LOCATION: Choose the location, date, and time that best works for your schedule. It only takes a few minutes to book your appointment. When you sign up for My Account, you can also modify your appointment anytime and fill out your Medical History ahead of time.
EYE_EXAM.SPEAK_TO_OUR_CUSTOMER1: Speak to our Customer Care team at
EYE_EXAM.SPEAK_TO_OUR_CUSTOMER2: to schedule your appointment. They will help you find the exact time and place most convenient for you, and they’ll be able to answer any questions you may have.
EYE_EXAM.RUN_IN_BETWEEN: Run in between errands. Our eye care experts are always happy to make time for you.

COLOR_VISION_TEST.TAKE_OUR_FREE: Take our Free Color Blind Test.
COLOR_VISION_TEST.COLOR_BLINDNESS: Color blindness is the inability to distinguish one or several chromatic colors, independent of the capacity for distinguishing light and shade. Usually inherited or present at birth, color blindness is caused by an absence of color-sensitive pigment in the cone cells of the retina. About one out of 20 women and one out of 12 men are color blind.
COLOR_VISION_TEST.WHEN_YOU_ARE: When you are color blind, you cannot distinguish the differences between certain colors, especially red, green, blue, or mixtures of these colors. Caused by an absence of color-sensitive pigment in the cone cells of the retina, most color vision problems are inherited and are present at birth.
COLOR_VISION_TEST.COULD_YOU_BE: Could you be color blind? Take this online version of the Ishihara Color Blindness Test to find out. This test consists of scanned plates, with a number in the center of a circle. If you can see the number, chances are you are not color blind. Please be aware that the colors here are not exactly the same as in the original version. Also, every computer screen has different color settings, therefore the test results might alter between different trials.
COLOR_VISION_TEST.QUESTION: Question
COLOR_VISION_TEST.IF_ITS_BEEN: If it’s been awhile since your last eye exam, or you’ve never had one, it’s time to schedule an appointment at a {brand} location near you!
COLOR_VISION_TEST.A perfect score indicates no color defic: A perfect score indicates no color deficiency.
COLOR_VISION_TEST.Only missing one color plate indicates a: Only missing one color plate indicates a normal range in the ability to see color.
COLOR_VISION_TEST.This score indicates the need for furthe: This score indicates the need for further testing to determine the severity of colorblindness.
COLOR_VISION_TEST.Any score below 7 is considered abnormal: Any score below 7 is considered abnormal and it is recommended that an appointment is scheduled with an Optometrist for further testing.

PRODUCTS.Q1: Can I bring a prescription from another doctor and just purchase the glasses from you?
PRODUCTS.A1: Yes. You can use your prescription from another doctor at Stanton Optical as long as your prescription is valid. Our specialists can help you complete your order accordingly.
PRODUCTS.Q2: Can I bring in my own frames and just purchase the lenses?
PRODUCTS.A2: Yes. We can use your own frame to mount new lenses provided that we inspect the frame condition to ensure that we can supply new lenses.
PRODUCTS.Q3: Do you offer an eyewear protection plan or warranty?
PRODUCTS.A3: Yes. The Frame Warranty is free and unlimited with every frame purchase, It's good for one year. You only pay 20% of the retail price to repair or replace your frames. We also offer a Lens Warranty available for purchase on the day of your purcahse and up to 30 days post your glasses purchase. It's a two-year unlimited warranty that protects your lenses against any and all damage. You only pay 20% of the retail price to repair or replace your lenses.
PRODUCTS.A4: Yes. We carry designer frames, brands vary by location. Please visit your local store if you're searching for a specific brand. With our large selection of more than 1,500 frames, you're sure to find a frame that fits your style.
PRODUCTS.Q5: How do I clean my glasses?
PRODUCTS.A5: Start by holding the frames under a faucet of warm water. Get your fingers soapy and GENTLY rub the lenses and the frame. This will remove grease and dirt without scratching the lenses. Next, gently dab your lenses with a clean soft cloth until dry. Rubbing dry lenses vigorously can easily scratch them, so be careful. You can also purchase a lens cleaning kit at Stanton Optical.
PRODUCTS.Q6: Which frame shape is best for my face shape?
PRODUCTS.A6: The simple rule is to select a pair of frames that serves as a contrast to your face shape and the size of the frame is scaled to fit your face. For a square face, choose oval or round frames to soften the jawline, rimless or semi-rimless are great options too. For a round or oval face shape, select frames that are angular shaped such as square, rectangular, or cat-eye to help provide more definition. If you have a heart-shaped face, select frames with a narrow, bottom-heavy frame, round or square with rounded edges, cat-eye works too. In the end, the best tip is to try everything and wear what makes you feel good. You might surprise yourself.
PRODUCTS.Q7: How do I adjust my frames?

A7.P1: We can adjust and clean your frames for free in-store. Visit us at your convenience. If you don't have a local store nearby, you can adjust your eyewear by yourself with these easy instructions.
A7.P2: If your glasses are sitting too low on your nose:
A7.P4: Use your thumbs to push your nose pads closer together until they fit snugly against the sides of your nose.
A7.P6: Run warm water for 30 seconds over the part of your frame you want to bend in order to soften it. Next, bend inward at the bridge, the hinges or the bend of your temple arms to make the frame fit more snugly to your face.
A7.P7: If your glasses are pinching your nose:
A7.P9: Use your thumbs to spread the nose pads out until they fit comfortably.
A7.P11: Run warm tap water over your glasses until they are pliable (this should take about 30 seconds) and then bend the nose piece outward slowly until it fits comfortably on the bridge of your nose.

A8.P1: Your pupillary distance or PD is the distance between the centers of your pupils. It determines where you look through the lens of your glasses.

PRODUCTS.Q9: How do I determine my PD (pupillary distance)?

A9.P1: The most precise way to obtain your PD is from your eye doctor. If your PD is not included with your prescription, we strongly recommend that you call your doctor and request your PD.
A9.P2: If your eye doctor cannot provide your PD, we can measure it for you in-store. If you can’t have it measured professionally, it is possible to measure it yourself with the instructions below…
A9.P11: Make sure to measure your PD multiple times to ensure that it is accurate and consistent.
A9.P12: For adults the PD ranges from 54mm - 74mm.
A9.P13: For children their PD ranges from 43mm - 53mm.
A9.P14: Steps to Measuring your PD on your Own:
A9.P15: Stand 8 inches away from the mirror. (Facing the mirror).
A9.P16: While facing the mirror, with your face straight, hold the ruler against your brow.
A9.P17: Start by closing your right eye, and align the the ruler's zero to the center of your left pupil.
A9.P18: While keeping your face straight, close your left eye and open your right eye.
A9.P19: Read the mm line that lines up with the center of your right pupil. That number is your Pupillary Distance.
A9.P20: Measuring your PD with a friend:
A9.P21: If a friend or family member is helping you measure your PD, simply stand in front of them with both eyes open, and have them put the zero on the millimeter ruler over the center of one pupil and have then measure the distance to the center of the other pupil.
A9.P22: Things to Remember when Having Your Friend Measure your PD:
A9.P23: Have them sit or crouch down while they measure your PD, so that they are out of your field of vision, and you are looking straight ahead.
A9.P24: Try to keep your eyes as still as possible. When looking straight ahead, focus on an object that is 10 - 20 ft away above their head.
A9.P25: Try your hardest not to look at the person measuring your PD!
A9.P26: Once you’ve measured your PD and have your prescription in hand, ordering your frames online is easy!

PUPILLARY_DISTANCE.HOW_TO_MEASURE: How to measure your Pupillary Distance (PD)
PUPILLARY_DISTANCE.IF_YOU_WANT: If you want to order glasses online from {brand} you will need to know your Pupillary Distance (PD). Here are a few definitions and tips for you to be ready to purchase your dream glasses from us with your PD ready!
PUPILLARY_DISTANCE.PD_IS_THE_DISTANCE: Pupillary Distance (PD) is the distance between the centers of your pupils. It determines where you look through the lens of your glasses. It is an essential measurement when buying a new pair of eyeglasses or prescription sunglasses online because it will align the center of each lens of your glasses with the front of your pupil.
PUPILLARY_DISTANCE.THERE_ARE_TWO_TYPES: There are two types of Pupillary Distance: Monocular and Binocular. If your PD has only one number, that's a Binocular PD. If your PD has two numbers, that's a Monocular PD.
PUPILLARY_DISTANCE.THE_MOST_PRESISE: The most precise way to obtain your PD is from your eye doctor. If your PD is not included with your prescription, we strongly recommend that you call your doctor and request your PD.
PUPILLARY_DISTANCE.IF_YOUR_EYE: If your eye doctor cannot provide your PD, we can measure it for you in-store. If you can’t have it measured professionally, it is possible to measure it yourself by following the instructions below.
PUPILLARY_DISTANCE.MAKE_SURE: Make sure to measure your PD multiple times to ensure that it is accurate and consistent.
PUPILLARY_DISTANCE.FOR_ADULTS: For adults the PD ranges from 54mm - 74mm.
PUPILLARY_DISTANCE.FOR_CHILDREN: For children their PD ranges from 43mm - 53mm.
PUPILLARY_DISTANCE.STEPS_TO_MEASUREING: Steps to Measuring your PD on your Own:
PUPILLARY_DISTANCE.STAND_8_INCHES: 1. Stand 8 inches away from the mirror. (Facing the mirror).
PUPILLARY_DISTANCE.WHILE_FACING: 2. While facing the mirror, with your face straight, hold the ruler against your brow.
PUPILLARY_DISTANCE.START_BY: 3. Start by closing your right eye, and align the the ruler's zero to the center of your left pupil.
PUPILLARY_DISTANCE.WHILE_KEEPING: 4. While keeping your face straight, close your left eye and open your right eye.
PUPILLARY_DISTANCE.READ_THE_MM: 5. Read the mm line that lines up with the center of your right pupil. That number is your Pupillary Distance.
PUPILLARY_DISTANCE.MEASURING_YOUR: Measuring your PD with a friend:
PUPILLARY_DISTANCE.IF_A_FRIEND: If a friend or family member is helping you measure your PD, simply stand in front of them with both eyes open, and have them put the zero on the millimeter ruler over the center of one pupil and have then measure the distance to the center of the other pupil.
PUPILLARY_DISTANCE.THINGS_TO_REMEMBER: Things to Remember when Having Your Friend Measure your PD:
PUPILLARY_DISTANCE.HAVE_THEM_SIT: Have them sit or crouch down while they measure your PD, so that they are out of your field of vision, and you are looking straight ahead.
PUPILLARY_DISTANCE.TRY_TO_KEEP: Try to keep your eyes as still as possible. When looking straight ahead, focus on an object that is 10 - 20 ft away above their head.
PUPILLARY_DISTANCE.TRY_YOUR_HARDEST: Try your hardest not to look at the person measuring your PD!
PUPILLARY_DISTANCE.ONCE_YOU_HAVE_MEASURED: Once you’ve measured your PD and have your prescription in hand, ordering your frames online is easy!
PUPILLARY_DISTANCE.CLICK_TO_DOWNLOAD: Click here to download the digital measurement ruler.
PUPILLARY_DISTANCE.TO_ORDER_FROM_STANTON_OPTICAL: To order from {brand}, you will need your up-to-date prescription, pupillary distance (PD), and your credit card.
PUPILLARY_DISTANCE.SELECT_YOUR_FRAMES: Select your frames, prescription type, and add-ons, then add the prescription from your account or enter it manually (you will add your PD there if we don’t have it in our records), and check out, as simple as that!
PUPILLARY_DISTANCE.IF_YOU_WERE_ABLE: If you were able to get your PD by following the instructions above, you are now all set to make your purchase! Select one of our featured frames below, or click to shop now to see all the frames selections we offer for you online.
PUPILLARY_DISTANCE.WHERE_IS_THE_PD: Where is the PD on my prescription?
PUPILLARY_DISTANCE.YOUR_PD_NUMBER: Your PD number will be in the ‘PD’ or ‘pupillary distance’ section of your eyeglass prescription. It could also be written where the doctor adds the notes or remarks. If you don’t find any PD information in your prescription, you can try calling your doctor and requesting it.
PUPILLARY_DISTANCE.WHY_DO_I_NEED: Why do I need to measure my PD multiple times?
PUPILLARY_DISTANCE.YOU_WANT_YOUR_PD: You want your PD to be exact! So, just to make sure and as a good practice, we recommend having it measured more than once. If your lenses aren’t centered correctly, they can cause discomfort and eye strain. A small margin of error might not cause problems, but it’s better to be as accurate as possible.
PUPILLARY_DISTANCE.IS_THERE_A_RANGE: Is there a range on the PD values?
PUPILLARY_DISTANCE.NORMALLY_AN_ADULT_PD: Normally an Adult PD range goes from 54mm to 74mm meanwhile, the kids PD ranges go from 43 mm to 53 mm, but every person’s PD can vary depending on different factors. Make sure your PD is as much accurate as possible.
PUPILLARY_DISTANCE.I_HAVE_TWO_PD: I have two PD numbers on my prescription, what does it mean?
PUPILLARY_DISTANCE.IF_YOUR_PRESCRIPTION: If your prescription has two pd numbers, says dual PD, monocular PD, or PD R and PD L; it means that you have a dual PD. It is the distance in millimeters between the centers of each pupil to the bridge of the nose. Normally, the values are the following way: PD 34/31, or PD R 34 L 31, where the first number is the right eye, and the second is the left eye. (Some prescriptions may have ‘OD’ for the ‘right’ eye, and ‘OS’ for ‘left’ eye.)
PUPILLARY_DISTANCE.I_DONT_HAVE: I don’t have a ruler with me, is there another way to measure my PD?
PUPILLARY_DISTANCE.WE_RECOMMED_USING: We recommend using a ruler since it is a tool that most of us can have handy, but if you don't have one, you use our downloadable ruler to measure your PD.
PUPILLARY_DISTANCE.THE_sINGLE_PUPILLARY: The single pupillary distance number is the distance in millimeters between one eye’s pupil to the other eye’s pupil, it is also known as Binocular PD, and it is noted in only one number, i.e. 63 mm, which is different from the dual PD having two numbers, i.e. R 31 mm L 32 mm.

BOPIS.METATITLE: Buy Glasses Online & Pick Up In-store Same Day - Stanton Optical
BOPIS.METADESCRIPTION: Need new glasses today? Browse our vast collection of eyeglass frames online and pick them up same-day at Stanton Optical store near you. Shop now!
BOPIS.TOP_BANNER_ALT: Buy Online, Pick-up in the store the same day!
BOPIS.HEADLINE: Buy Online, Pick-up in Store
BOPIS.HOW_WORKS_DESC: Buy and wear your new frames on the same day!
BOPIS.SHOP_FRAMES_DESC: Once you have selected a frame, we will show you the stores available for same-day pickup near you in checkout.
BOPIS.GET_NOTIFIED_ALT: Get Notified when Ready to Pick-up
BOPIS.GET_NOTIFIED_DESC: We will send you an email and text alert when your order is ready for in-store pickup.
BOPIS.EASY_PICKUP_DESC: Once you have received your order confirmation, swing by the store and we will have your frames ready for you to pick up.
BOPIS.Q1: What is Buy Online Pickup In Store?
BOPIS.A1:
Stanton Optical is making eye care easy. You can now purchase glasses online at stantonoptical.com and pick them up the SAME DAY at any available location.

  • Orders will be available for same day pick-up if placed between 10am - 4pm ET Monday-Saturday. All other orders will be available the next day excluding Sunday.
  • Product and prescription exclusions apply.
BOPIS.Q2: What do I need to bring to pick up my order?
BOPIS.A2:
1. Your Order Confirmation e-mail or order number.
  2. Your valid government issued ID. For your protection, we will only release the order if the customer name on the confirmation e-mail matches the name on the ID.
BOPIS.Q3: What if I want to modify my order or cancel?
BOPIS.A3: Modifications can only be made :15 minutes after placing your order, otherwise we will have already begun processing your glasses. Simply call your pickup store (order listed on your confirmation email), and they will assist you with the modification needed.
BOPIS.Q4: How do I place my buy online pickup in store order?
BOPIS.A4:
1. Start by shopping from the list of eligible frames here.
  2. Enter your prescription.
  3. Select your preferred Stanton Optical store for pick-up.
  4. Checkout and submit order.
  5. Wait for your “Order Confirmation” email/text message. This lets you know the order has been received and is in progress.
  6. Wait for your “Order is Ready for Pickup” email/text message. This lets you know you can now come to the store to pick up your glasses.
  7. Be sure to bring your order number, and picture ID to the store for pick-up.
  8. When you arrive at the store, visit the eyewear dispense station.
  9. You can take your glasses and go, or you can spend a few minutes with our Eye care specialist for a fit adjustment.
BOPIS.Q5: How will Stanton Optical notify me when my order is ready?
BOPIS.A5:
• We will send you an email and text message to notify you that your order is ready for pickup.
  • If you don’t receive a notification from us or have questions about your order, please contact the store directly. The number is listed on your order confirmation address underneath the store’s address.
BOPIS.Q6: What happens if I can’t pick up my order the same day?
BOPIS.A6: We will keep your order for 120 days and send you an email/text reminder to pick up your order. If after 120 days, you don’t pick up your order it will be returned and a store credit will be provided towards a future order.
BOPIS.Q7: Is buy online pickup in store available for all glasses, sunglasses, and contacts?
BOPIS.A7: You will find all the eyeglass frames and sunglass frames available for store pick-up here. At this time contacts are not available for this service.
BOPIS.Q8: Can I have someone else pickup my order?
BOPIS.A8: Yes. Please ensure they have your order number and your phone number so we can call you during pickup to receive your consent.
BOPIS.Q9: Is there a cost for same day pickup?
BOPIS.A9: It’s FREE! There is no additional cost for this service.
BOPIS.Q10: When will I be charged for my order?
BOPIS.A10: Payment will be processed online during checkout, prior to picking up your glasses.
BOPIS.DISCLAIMER_1: *Buy Online Pickup In-store is available at any location, certain prescription or product exclusions may apply.
BOPIS.DISCLAIMER_2: **Offer available online only. Get 50% off the regular price of any frames, lenses, and anti-reflective coating purchase. Excludes the cost of lens add-on options. Cannot be combined with other offers or insurance. Additional services or upgrades may change the price of the offer.

SAME_DAY_GLASSES.METADESCRIPTION: Need glasses today? Get prescription single-vision glasses made in half an hour with our on-site labs. Check more details here!
SAME_DAY_GLASSES.HERO_DESCRIPTION: Need glasses today? Get prescription single-vision glasses* made in half an hour with our on-site labs.
SAME_DAY_GLASSES.HERO_DISCLAIMER_TEXT: *Same-day service is only available for single vision eyeglasses, certain prescription or product exclusions may apply
SAME_DAY_GLASSES.OUR_LAB_VIDEO_ALT: How we make the glasses in our labs
SAME_DAY_GLASSES.OUR_LAB_TITLE: Take a peek inside our lab
SAME_DAY_GLASSES.OUR_LAB_DESCRIPTION: Our trained lab technicians use quality, automated technology to make your single-vision glasses quickly and efficiently.
SAME_DAY_GLASSES.STEP_1_DESCRIPTION: Your frames are automatically scanned and locking pads are added so your pupillary distance is set right.
SAME_DAY_GLASSES.STEP_2_DESCRIPTION: We customize and polish your single-vision lenses with our high-tech edger for a perfect fit.
SAME_DAY_GLASSES.STEP_3_DESCRIPTION: We mount the lens into your frame and carefully hand-inspect each one for quality.
SAME_DAY_GLASSES.REVIEW_1_CONTENT: I couldn't ask for a better place to get glasses and eye exams. The employees are very helpful and friendly and with my son just turning 18 and starting in the workforce, they took the time to find him every discount they could to help him. And he got his glasses the same day. I would recommend them to everyone.
SAME_DAY_GLASSES.REVIEW_2_CONTENT: Amazing service! Kendrick, the associate who helped me, was so kind and knowledgeable. All of the staff was wonderful with answering my questions and I was able to walk out with my glasses the same day! Highly recommended.
SAME_DAY_GLASSES.REVIEW_3_CONTENT: If I could give more stars, I would. Stanton Optical saved the day (specifically John in the La Mesa store). He was able to get me into glasses during an emergency SAME DAY! THIS is my best place for all things glasses!!!! Thanks.
SAME_DAY_GLASSES.REVIEW_4_CONTENT: First time here and had amazing service. The best part was being able to get my daughter's new glasses on the same day. We will be back!
